short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to capture your screen and easily create instructional videos, demos, internal communications, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With WeVideo’s Quick Recorder, you can easily record:
✔ Presentations
✔ How-to videos and tutorials
✔ Product demos
✔ Internal communication videos for your team
✔ And more!

Download this extension today and:
✔ Record your screen and webcam individually or at the same time
✔ Record your microphone for voice overs
✔ Use your cursor to highlight what’s important
✔ Draw on your screen using marker tools
✔ Download your video and share wherever you’d like
✔ No watermarks!
✔ Save directly to Google Drive and OneDrive
✔ Send directly to the WeVideo editor to add music, crop, use green screen, and SO much more!
